fhaFinancingOption.description: How the FHA Upfront MIP is paid — either financed into the loan amount or paid in cash.

usdaFinancingOption.description: How the USDA Guarantee Fee is handled — financed or paid in cash.

vaFinancingOption.description: How the VA Funding Fee is handled — financed or paid in cash.

vaLoanHistory.description: Whether the borrower has previously used their VA entitlement.

purpose.description: Loan purpose, driving eligibility and pricing logic.

aus.description: Automated underwriting system used for the loan.

temporaryBuydownType.description: Type of temporary buydown applied. Controls investor adjustments and eligibility.

loanType.description: Loan program classification — determines rulesets and pricing logic.

impoundType.description: Indicates whether property taxes and insurance are impounded.

streamlineRefinanceType.description: Streamline refinance category. Used for FHA/VA streamline rules.
